LINDSEY BAKER 
COURT COORDINATOR 
817 / 884-1597 
Honorable David L. Evans JAMES 8. MUNFORD 
DISTRICT JUDGE 
322ND JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF TEXAS 
TARRANT COUNTY FAMILY LAW CENTER 
200 E. WEATHERFORD STREET 
FORT WORTH, TEXAS 76196 
(817) 844-1429 
October 8, 2024 
Presiding Judge of the 8th Administrative Region 
Tom Vandergriff Civil Courts Building 
100 N. Calhoun Street, 4th Floor 
Fort Worth, Texas 76196 Tele. (817) 884-1558; Fax (817) 884-1560 
RE: CAUSE NO. 322-744263-23 LINDA VERA 
COURT REPORTER 
817 / 884-1428 
In the Matter of the Marriage of Morgan Myers and Charles Myers and In the Interest of 
Mara Myers and Caroline Myers, Minor Children 
Dear Judge Evans: 
I have enclosed an Order of Referral regarding a Joint Motion to Recuse Judge filed in the above 
cause, a copy of which is attached to the Order of Referral. 
Pursuant to the rules, I will not set any further hearings in this matter until the Motion to Recuse 
is heard and ruled upon. 
Thank you for your consideration in this matter.

Lindsey K. Baker 
From: 
Sent: 
To: 
Subject: Lindsey K. Baker 
Tuesday, October 8, 2024 4:41 PM 
Tracy Kemp 
Myers 322-744263-23 
Attachments: Correspondence.pdf; Myers-Order of Referral.pdf 
Ms. Kemp: 
Attached please find correspondence from Judge Munford and an Order of Referral. 
Thank you. 
L~13CWW 
322nd Court Coordinator 
Tarrant County Family Law Center 
200 E. Weatherford, 4th floor 
Fort Worth, Texas 76196
